channel.title: Any1 know mysql?
channel.description: Okay, whenever i let sum1 connect to my server, all i do is open no-ip and turn my firewalls off. Then people can connect. Well, I am trying to get [b]Mysql[/b] working and my friend said the only way to use [b]mysql[/b] is to use a [b]router[/b]? But i don't got a [b]router[/b] and i heard they are kinda expensive? Is there any way around this?

item.title: Any1 know mysql?

@m_o_d_chris wrote:

use hamchi, it works smoother

item.title: Any1 know mysql?
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

[quote=“mata20000, post:2, topic:177114”]use hamachi[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2008, 10:02:57 PM[/size][hr]i dont think its needs a router[/quote]dude, did yo even read what i asked for? I never said people cannot connect to my server. I said do i need a router to use mysql? And why did you tell me to use hamachi it sucks balls? and another thing, if i infact don’t need a router for mysql, how the hell do I use it?

Read full topic
